property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a Mafi Gang from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack unless one of your creatures that has 12000 power or more attacked this turn. {SMASH BURST} (Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast its spell side in the battle zone for no cost.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less and put it into its owners mana zone.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less and put it into its owners mana zone.
